my-portfolio.name: My Portfolio
my-portfolio.description: A responsive personal website designed to showcase my information, skills, and projects, featuring an interactive project gallery and a contact form.

keiben.name: Keiben Srl
keiben.description: I created a modern, responsive showcase website for Keiben Srl, clearly presenting their range of fillers and smoothing compounds.

sub_track.name: Sub Track
sub_track.description: A privacy-focused mobile app to track subscriptions. Features expense dashboards, custom renewal alerts, and offline storage to keep financial data secure.
